name: Board Game
description: Project for IB Comp Sci IA 2018-2019: Computer Version of the board game: Kingdoms and Knights. This program will allow players to play the board game Kingdoms and Knights on the computer. Kingdoms and Knights is a strategy board game created by: Zach Greenberg, Jackson Elder, and Hayden Soelberg
